org.opendaylight.controller.topologymanager.internal

Class TopologyManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.topologymanager.internal.TopologyManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandProvider, ICacheUpdateAware<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>, IConfigurationAwareCommon, IConfigurationContainerAware, IListenTopoUpdates, IObjectReader, IInventoryListener, ITopologyManager, ITopologyManagerShell

    public class TopologyManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICacheUpdateAware<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>, ITopologyManager, ITopologyManagerShell, IConfigurationContainerAware, IListenTopoUpdates, IObjectReader, IInventoryListener, CommandProvider
    The class describes TopologyManager which is the central repository of the network topology. It provides service for applications to interact with topology database and notifies all the listeners of topology changes.

      • getHostAttachedToNodeConnector

        public Host getHostAttachedToNodeConnector(NodeConnector port)
        Description copied from interface: ITopologyManager
        Return the Host attached to a NodeConnector with Host. Multiple hosts maybe attached to a node connector. This method returns the first one only. Hence it has been deprecated. Use the new method getHostsAttachedToNodeConnector that returns the complete list of hosts.
        Specified by:
        getHostAttachedToNodeConnector in interface ITopologyManager
        Returns:
        The Host attached to a NodeConnector

      • entryCreated

        public void entryCreated(java.lang.Object key,
                java.lang.String cacheName,
                boolean originLocal)
        Description copied from interface: ICacheUpdateAware
        Invoked when a new entry is available in the cache, the key is only provided, the value will come as an entryUpdate invocation
        Specified by:
        entryCreated in interface ICacheUpdateAware<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        Parameters:
        key - Key for the entry just created
        cacheName - name of the cache for which update has been received
        originLocal - true if the event is generated from this node

        Parameters:
        key - Key for the entry modified
